The color of the card.
_cardCount - Variable in class ViewDeckIconJPanel
Used in the algorithm to decide that color order of the flash cards to paint.

The total counts currently stored in ModelFlashCardDeck._deck.

Used to paint the card count string in the corner.

The current ID that was last assigned to a newly created card.
_cardText - Variable in class ViewFlashCardJPanel
The text that will be shown on the JPanel, could be text of the front or back data.
_centerJPanelFlashCard - Variable in class ViewMainScreenJPanel
Reference to the center JPanel that displays contents of the current viewing card.
_chckbxSameColorFor - Variable in class ViewEditCardJDialog
Check box that when checked will keep all newly created cards the same color.
_chosenColor - Variable in class ControllerMain
Holds the color that all new cards will be created by if _colorLock is true.
_colorLock - Variable in class ControllerMain
Returns true if the user wants all new cards created to have the same color.
_colorsTable - Variable in class ControllerMain
Stored colors that enables new cards to obtain a color from.
_completeDeck - Variable in class ModelFlashCardAllDecks
The complete deck, stores all created card in order.
_currentCard - Variable in class ControllerMain
Stores the data of the current card being displayed.
_currentDeck - Variable in class ViewDeckIconJPanel
A copy of the current deck in reverse.
_deck - Variable in class ModelFlashCardDeck
The array used to store all single flash cards.
_deckCardCountFont - Static variable in class ViewDeckIconJPanel
Saved font for drawing the card count.
_deckTitle - Variable in class ViewDeckIconJPanel
Stores the current title of the deck to be drawn during repaint().
_deckTitleFont - Static variable in class ViewDeckIconJPanel
Saved font for drawing the title.
_editCardJDialog - Variable in class ViewMainScreenJPanel
Reference to the edit card JDialog window.
_editFront - Variable in class ControllerMain
Used by the editing JDialog window to determine when to show text for front or back of _currentCard.
_file - Variable in class ControllerMain
Stores the file being opened or saved into.
_fileChooser - Variable in class ViewMainScreenJPanel
File browsing component.
_front - Variable in class ControllerMain
Returns true if the card is currently showing data of the front of the card.

The String of the front of the card.
_ID - Variable in class ModelFlashCard
The ID of the card, assigned by the deck it was added to.
_isChanged - Variable in class ControllerMain
Returns true if the user made some changes to the deck.
_isHover - Variable in class ViewDeckIconJPanel
Checks if the panel is being hovered over with a mouse so that the background color can be changed.
_isSelected - Variable in class ViewDeckIconJPanel
Used to check if the deck is selected.

Paints a "Selected" string in the corner if selected.

Indicates the ID of the card being displayed.

A reference to the main controller needed to call certain methods when a button is pushed.

Reference to the main controller that manage the appearance of this JPanel.
_mainDeck - Variable in class ModelFlashCardAllDecks
A changeable deck that stores created card that is also stored in main deck.

Reference to the JPanel that displayed graphical representation of the main deck.
_mainJFrame - Variable in class ViewMainScreenJPanel
The main JFrame this window is contained in.

The main GUI that controls all visual components.
_memorizedDeck - Variable in class ModelFlashCardAllDecks
A changeable deck that allows the user to move cards from _mainDeck into this.
_memorizedDeckIconJPanel - Variable in class ViewMainScreenJPanel
Reference to the JPanel that displayed graphical representation of the memorized deck.
_newFile - Variable in class ControllerMain
Returns true if the deck is currently a new deck and was not loaded from a file.
_popUpMessages - Variable in class ControllerMain
Returns true if there is a message or window currently opened.
_southPanel - Variable in class ViewFlashCardJPanel
Lower JPanel used for storing _lblCardSide and _lblCardID.
_tempOldBackText - Variable in class ControllerMain
Holds old card back text data, reverts to this if cancel button is pushed during editing.
_tempOldColor - Variable in class ControllerMain
Holds old card color data, reverts to this if cancel button is pushed during editing.
_tempOldFrontText - Variable in class ControllerMain
Holds old card front text data, reverts to this if cancel button is pushed during editing.
_textPane - Variable in class ViewEditCardJDialog
Text pane for entering in String for front and back data of the current card.
_viewingMainDeck - Variable in class ControllerMain
Returns true if the user is currently viewing the main deck and not the memorized deck.
